suggest.ext-imagick: Improves PDF/image rendering for pin thumbnails and reports
suggest.ext-gd: Enables server-side thumbnail generation for uploaded photos
suggest.ext-curl: Allows remote image fetching for exports when needed
suggest.ext-fileinfo: Ensures reliable MIME detection for uploads

scripts.dwg:pull-image: php -r "if (!getenv('DWG_IMAGE')) { echo 'Set env var DWG_IMAGE and run again (e.g. DWG_IMAGE=libredwg/libredwg:latest)\n'; exit(1); } $img=getenv('DWG_IMAGE'); passthru('docker pull '.escapeshellarg($img)); echo 'Pulled ' . $img . '\n';"
